trans-unit.source: Represents a link to a file that is displayed in a [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: 代表檔案中所顯示的連結[!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)]工作列跳躍清單。

trans-unit.source: A JumpPath is a reference to a file that can be opened from a [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: JumpPath 是可以從開啟的檔案的參考[!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)]工作列跳躍清單。

trans-unit.source: If your application is not registered to handle the file type of the item, the file will not appear in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式未註冊來處理檔案類型的項目中，檔案不會出現在跳躍清單。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you add a JumpPath to a .txt file, your application must be registered to handle .txt files.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您加入 JumpPath.txt 檔案時，必須註冊您的應用程式處理.txt 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to the file to be included in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要包含在跳躍清單之檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The application must be registered to handle the file name extension of the specified file; otherwise, the item is rejected.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式必須登錄來處理指定的檔案名稱副檔名否則，會拒絕的項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you add a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> to a .txt file, your application must be registered to handle .txt files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您加入<xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>至.txt 檔案中，必須註冊您的應用程式來處理.txt 檔案。</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>

trans-unit.source: The path to the file to be included in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: 要包含在跳躍清單檔案的路徑。
